33 (d), which states that the undertaking shall disclose ‘complementary information necessary to
provide sufficient context’.
Question ID 444 - Payment practices
Release date
May 2024
Question asked
Regarding the DR on payment practices in G1-6, is the information on payment practices only
expected regarding SMEs or a wider range of suppliers?
